description: Microsoft Edge Version Check is a simple set of instructions for users to verify that they are running the latest version of the browser. First, open your Microsoft Edge browser and locate the three dots in the upper right corner of the window. Click on these dots, then navigate to 'Help and feedback'. From there, select 'About Microsoft Edge' to see the version details. It is crucial to ensure the browser is updated to the latest version in order to mitigate vulnerabilities, such as CVE-2023-6346, which is addressed in the latest releases. Regularly checking the version helps maintain security and stability of the browser.
